vocabInfos.lsjDefs: Transliteration of Hebrew רֵיק  'worthless' [H7386]. Not in LSJ.
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
§ Raca (a term of abuse, derived from Aramaic, meaning "empty[-headed] one"), "empty-headed [?]"
raca, an Aramaic term of bitter contempt, worthless fellow, fool, Mt. 5:22*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 笨蛋, 蠢人, 中文聖經音譯為"拉加" (太 5:22)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 笨蛋, 蠢人, 中文圣经音译为"拉加" (太 5:22)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: (tiếng A-ram) ngu xuẩn; đồ ngốc; đồ ngu. Xem H7386.
